nodes.id: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
en: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区西长安街13号
location.en: 13 West Chang'an Avenue, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管工业和信息产业的组成部门。2008年3月根据第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过的国务院机构改革方案，在原信息产业部、国防科学技术工业委员会等部门的基础上组建。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for industry and information technology. It was established in March 2008 based on the institutional reform plan of the State Council passed by the first session of the 11th National People's Congress, consolidating the former Ministry of Information Industry, the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense, and other departments.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，即中央人民政府。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, i.e., the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部部长、党组书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部副部长、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Minister and Party Group Member of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部副部长、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Minister and Party Group Member of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Minister of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Minister of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部副部长、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Minister and Party Group Member of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部副部长、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Minister and Party Group Member of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央纪委国家监委驻工业和信息化部纪检监察组组长、工业和信息化部党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, current head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission stationed at the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, and a member of the Party Group of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部党组成员兼国家烟草专卖局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Party Group Member of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and Director of the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部总经济师。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chief Economist of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部总工程师。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chief Engineer of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任工业和信息化部总工程师。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chief Engineer of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国信息产业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国信息产业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院原组成部门，2008年并入新组建的工业和信息化部。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, merged into the newly formed Ministry of Industry and Information Technology in 2008.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会
国防科学技术工业委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院原组成部门，2008年其大部分职责并入新组建的工业和信息化部。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. Most of its responsibilities were merged into the newly formed Ministry of Industry and Information Technology in 2008.

nodes.id: 国务院信息化工作办公室

zh-cn: 国务院信息化工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院原办事机构，2008年其职责并入新组建的工业和信息化部。
description.en: A former administrative office of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. Its responsibilities were merged into the newly formed Ministry of Industry and Information Technology in 2008.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 2008年举行的中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会会议，会议通过了关于国务院机构改革方案的决定，批准组建工业和信息化部。
description.en: A session of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China held in 2008, which passed the decision on the institutional reform plan of the State Council, approving the establishment of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 2008年第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过的关于中华人民共和国国务院机构改革的方案，该方案决定组建工业和信息化部。
description.en: The plan for the institutional reform of the State Council of the People's Republic of China passed by the first session of the 11th National People's Congress in 2008. This plan decided to establish the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会
国家发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，是综合研究拟订经济和社会发展政策，进行总量平衡，指导总体经济体制改革的宏观调控部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which is a macroeconomic management agency that comprehensively studies and formulates economic and social development policies, conducts overall balancing, and guides the overall economic system reform.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部管理的国家局，负责组织管理国防科技工业计划、政策、标准及法规的制定与执行。
description.en: A state bureau managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China, responsible for organizing and managing the formulation and implementation of national defense science, technology, and industry plans, policies, standards, and regulations.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部管理的国家局，实行与中国烟草总公司一套机构、两块牌子的管理体制。
description.en: A state bureau managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China, which operates under a management system of 'one institution, two names' with the China National Tobacco Corporation.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 2018年由中共中央印发的关于党和国家机构改革的文件，该方案将国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心的管理权由工信部划转至中央网信办。
description.en: A document on the reform of party and state institutions issued by the Central Committee of the CCP in 2018. This plan transferred the management of the National Computer Network and Information Security Management Center from the MIIT to the Cyberspace Administration of China.

nodes.id: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心

zh-cn: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家级互联网应急中心，原由工业和信息化部管理，2018年后由中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室管理。
description.en: The national-level Internet emergency response center of China, formerly managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, and managed by the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission since 2018.

nodes.id: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 中共中央的直属机构，负责互联网信息内容管理、网络安全等工作。对外加挂国家互联网信息办公室牌子。
description.en: A directly affiliated institution of the Central Committee of the CCP, responsible for internet information content management, cybersecurity, etc. It also bears the name of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管卫生健康事业的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national health.

description.zh-cn: 针对烟草的第一个世界范围的国际公约。工业和信息化部原为该公约在中国履约的牵头部门。
description.en: The first worldwide international treaty on tobacco. The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology was formerly the lead department for its implementation in China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国互联网行业及与互联网相关的企事业单位、社会组织自愿结成的全国性、行业性、非营利性社会组织。2020年前由工业和信息化部主管。
description.en: A national, industry-specific, non-profit social organization voluntarily formed by enterprises, institutions, and social organizations in China's internet industry and related fields. It was supervised by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology before 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中国的无线电行业社会团体。2020年前由工业和信息化部主管。
description.en: A social organization for the radio industry in China. It was supervised by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology before 2020.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国科学技术部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国科学技术部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管科学技术事业的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for science and technology.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 2023年举行的中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会会议，会议通过的国务院机构改革方案决定将科技部部分职责划入工业和信息化部。
description.en: A session of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China held in 2023. The State Council institutional reform plan passed at the meeting decided to transfer some responsibilities from the Ministry of Science and Technology to the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责民用航天管理及国际空间合作的政府机构，对外由工业和信息化部保留牌子。
description.en: A government agency of the People's Republic of China responsible for civil space administration and international space cooperation. The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology retains its nameplate for external affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管核工业的行政机关，对外由工业和信息化部保留牌子。
description.en: An administrative agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of the nuclear industry. The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology retains its nameplate for external affairs.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。
description.en: A public university in Beijing, China, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。
description.en: A public university in Beijing, China, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国黑龙江省哈尔滨市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。
description.en: A public university in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国陕西省西安市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。
description.en: A public university in Xi'an, Shaanxi, China, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省南京市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。
description.en: A public university in Nanjing, Jiangsu, China, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省南京市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。
description.en: A public university in Nanjing, Jiangsu, China, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国黑龙江省哈尔滨市的公立大学，由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属。
description.en: A public university in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China, directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任工业和信息化部首任部长、党组书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the first Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任工业和信息化部部长、党组书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任工业和信息化部部长、党组书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任工业和信息化部部长、党组书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国致公党成员，曾任工业和信息化部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, member of the China Zhi Gong Party, former Vice Minister of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology is a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 国务院机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过《第十一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议关于国务院机构改革方案的决定》，批准了《国务院机构改革方案》。
description.en: The First Session of the 11th National People's Congress passed the 'Decision on the Institutional Reform Plan of the State Council', approving the 'Institutional Reform Plan of the State Council'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 2008年的国务院机构改革方案决定组建工业和信息化部，整合了原信息产业部、国防科工委、国家发改委的工业行业管理职责以及国务院信息化工作办公室的职责。
description.en: The 2008 State Council institutional reform plan decided to establish the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, integrating the responsibilities of the former Ministry of Information Industry, COSTIND, the industrial management functions of the NDRC, and the State Council Informatization Office.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国信息产业部

description.zh-cn: 根据2008年国务院机构改革方案，信息产业部被撤销，其职责整合进新组建的工业和信息化部。
description.en: According to the 2008 State Council institutional reform plan, the Ministry of Information Industry was abolished, and its responsibilities were integrated into the newly formed Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防科学技术工业委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据2008年国务院机构改革方案，国防科学技术工业委员会被撤销，其职责（核电管理除外）整合进新组建的工业和信息化部。
description.en: According to the 2008 State Council institutional reform plan, the Commission of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense was abolished, and its responsibilities (except for nuclear power management) were integrated into the newly formed Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 国务院信息化工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 根据2008年国务院机构改革方案，国务院信息化工作办公室被撤销，其职责整合进新组建的工业和信息化部。
description.en: According to the 2008 State Council institutional reform plan, the State Council Informatization Office was abolished, and its responsibilities were integrated into the newly formed Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 国家国防科技工业局由工业和信息化部管理。
description.en: The State Administration for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense is managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 国家烟草专卖局由工业和信息化部管理。
description.en: The State Tobacco Monopoly Administration is managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革方案
relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 该方案决定将国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心由工业和信息化部管理调整为由中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室管理。
description.en: This plan decided to transfer the management of the National Computer Network and Information Security Management Center from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology to the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

relationships.source: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月前，国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心由工业和信息化部管理。
description.en: Before March 2018, the National Computer Network and Information Security Management Center was managed by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.source: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心
relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 自2018年3月起，国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心由中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室管理。
description.en: Since March 2018, the National Computer Network and Information Security Management Center has been managed by the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
relationships.target: 烟草控制框架公约

description.zh-cn: 工业和信息化部牵头《烟草控制框架公约》履约的职责被划入国家卫生健康委员会。
description.en: The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology's role in leading the implementation of the Framework Convention on Tobacco Control was transferred to the National Health Commission.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会
relationships.target: 烟草控制框架公约

description.zh-cn: 国家卫生健康委员会接替工业和信息化部，成为牵头《烟草控制框架公约》履约的部门。
description.en: The National Health Commission took over from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology to become the lead department for implementing the Framework Convention on Tobacco Control.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 2020年8月31日，中国互联网协会与工业和信息化部分离，不再设置业务主管单位。
description.en: On August 31, 2020, the Internet Society of China was decoupled from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and no longer has a professional supervisory unit.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 2020年8月31日，中国无线电协会与工业和信息化部分离，不再设置业务主管单位。
description.en: On August 31, 2020, the Radio Association of China was decoupled from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and no longer has a professional supervisory unit.

relationships.source: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 会议批准的《国务院机构改革方案》将科学技术部的组织拟订高新技术发展及产业化规划和政策等职责划入工业和信息化部。
description.en: The 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan' approved at the meeting transferred responsibilities such as organizing and drafting high-tech development and industrialization plans and policies from the Ministry of Science and Technology to the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 北京航空航天大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Beihang University is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 北京理工大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Beijing Institute of Technology is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 哈尔滨工业大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Harbin Institute of Technology is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 西北工业大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Northwestern Polytechnical University is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 南京航空航天大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 南京理工大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Nanjing University of Science and Technology is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 哈尔滨工程大学是工业和信息化部直属高等学校。
description.en: Harbin Engineering University is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

position.zh-cn: 副部长、党组成员（兼国家航天局局长、国家原子能机构主任、国家国防科工局局长）
